name: Apollo X (N8python)
description:
Exciting ragdoll-based space combat game.

Fight enemies, get coins, buy weapons and upgrade your character!

Then use the weapons and upgrades to fight enemies!

To get coins!

To upgrade your character...

Instructions:

Press space to move toward the mouse pointer.

Hold down the mouse to shoot.

If you have the harpoon, hold down the mouse to control it.

Find important upgrades and new weapons in the shop.
